subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: If Dwyane Wade is unable to return to his dominant ways, there is a question of whether LeBron James, who can opt out of his contract, will be interested in staying in Miami.
snippet: If Dwyane Wade is unable to return to his dominant ways, there is a question of whether LeBron James, who can opt out of his contract, will be interested in staying in Miami.
